Name: milk evaporation | evaporation of milk | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/10:Manufacture of food products/105:Manufacture of dairy products/1050:Manufacture of dairy products
Description: Evaporation occurs in a 5-effect evaporator with thermal vapour recompression (TVR). ;Motor power is 75kW, and evaporation is performed with steam consumption of 1610 kg/h. Evaporator capacity is 15 ton of milk per hour. ;References : ;WESTERGAARD, V. ( 2004). Milk powder technology : evaporation and spray drying. Report for GEA Niro, Danemark. 301 p.
